front.title: •Mighty Jabba
front.gametext: Deploys -2 to a Jabba's Palace site. When with your alien leader, adds one battle destiny. May escort a captive. To use his landspeed requires +1 Force. May not be targeted by weapons unless your other aliens present are each 'hit'. Immune to attrition < 4.
front.lore: Hutt leader of notorious criminal organization. Gangster of the vilest ilk. Would rather forfeit a fortune in cash than risk one whisper attesting to his mercy.

combo: Mighty Jabba + 4-LOM With Concussion Rifle 4-LOM adds one battle destiny with Jabba.
Mighty Jabba + Boelo Cancel one opponent's battle destiny.
